class.name: MultivariateMultiStartOptimizer

javadoc.text: Special implementation of the {@link MultivariateOptimizer} interface adding * multi-start features to an existing optimizer. * This class wraps a classical optimizer to use it several times in * turn with different starting points in order to avoid being trapped * into a local extremum when looking for a global one.
Create a multi-start optimizer from a single-start optimizer.
javadoc.param: starts Number of starts to perform (including the * first one), multi-start is disabled if value is less than or * equal to 1.
generator Random vector generator to use for restarts.

class.comment:
